description:
A no-nonsense, super-wide 11 speed cassette for steep climbs and fast descents. The PG1130 is light, durable and offers a range that's perfect for any ride.

  • Compatible with Shimano style freehub, not the SRAM-specific XD driver
  • 11-speeds (11-12-14-16-18-21-24-28-32-36-42) offers a wide range for the up and down
  • Optimized gear steps across entire range
name: SRAM PG1130 11-42T 11 Speed Cassette
